#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,s[15],i,j,aa,bb,cc;
    long long int n,a;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        j=aa=bb=cc=0;
        if(n<10)
        {
            cout<<"0\n";
            continue;
        }
        while(n>0)
        {
            a=n%10;
            n/=10;
            s[j++]=a;
        }
        for(i=0;i<j-1;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]==s[i+1])
                aa=1;
            else
            {
                if(s[i]>s[i+1])
                    bb=1;
                else
                    cc=1;

            }
        }
            if(bb&&cc)
            cout<<"1\n";
            else
            cout<<"0\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
